wikipedia_page.main: John Clowes Grundy (1806–1867) was an English printseller and art patron.

response: Graves married the daughter of an art dealer, John Clowes Grundy from Manchester, England and they had a son, Herbert Seymour Graves, who later assisted Graves with later editions of the Dictionary of Artists series.  His son died in 1898.
* John Clowes Grundy (1806–1867), English printseller and art patron
